metadata.description: The BXR NFT is a collection of 50 unique NFTs - digital tokens stored on the Ethereum blockchain. Holding The BXR NFT signifies your belonging to the BXR community and includes unlimited access to any BXR site at a fixed discounted Flow member monthly rate.
metadata.short_description: Get unlimited access to London's state-of-the-art fitness destination. Award winning facilities, best-in-class equipment, and London's most respected coaches all together under one roof, curated to meet every demand from the modern athlete. They don't just train champions, they make them.
metadata.provider_description: Founded in London's W1, BXR is the world's first and foremost elite boxing-gym concept. They are the trailblazers in fitness and wellbeing, pushing boundaries in what a boxing gym should and could be; progressive training modalities, elite-standard equipment and facilities and expert-level trainers combined in an award winning luxury space.
metadata.name: BXR
utility: 15% discount on multi-site membership for unlimited gym access and unlimited member classes
State-of-the-art fitness facilities plus steam, sauna, and ice basin
Exclusive pack of SWEAT by BXR classes
Industry-best professionals for personal, group, combat, and strength and conditioning training
Early bird pricing for clinics and retreats
Access to the brightest and best professionals through injury rehabilitation, osteopathy, sports massage, sports psychology and nutritional advice
metadata.activation_notes: NFT holders can connect their wallet to the Flow app for pay-as-you-go access to BXR or use the promo code to activate a multi-site membership for unlimited gym access & unlimited member classes. The membership requires a monthly subscription to remain active. The token is fully transferable and can be recycled at any time.
